ComicInfo.Summary:
Starchie: Bottleneck frames Starchie so that Starchie goes to prison and Bottleneck can take over the girls and rackets at the high school.
From Eternity Back to Here!: Prewitt will not fight, no matter what, and Sgt. Warden and Mrs. Homes drown on the beach.
3-Dimensions!: A phony description of how 3-D comics are made and a look at what can go wrong.
Mark Trade!: Parody of the comic strip Mark Trail, finding Mark sick and tired of nature.
ComicInfo.Tags: Reggie Mantle,Little Orphan Annie,Veronica Lodge,Mary Andrews,Mark Trail,Mr. Weatherbee,Blondie,Fred Andrews,Jughead Jones,Betty Cooper,Dick Tracy,Archie Andrews
